channel.title: Player starting position > PI > 317
channel.description:
hello, and yes before you leave your comments, i know exactly how to change the player starting position... it's currently in config.java and looks like this: [code]public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 1234; public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 1234;[/code] what i want to do is to make it start on the roof of a building, for this the player height would have to be "-1" ... so what i basically want to know how to do is to make it so that you can edit the height aswell, and don't leave uneducated comments like
its so easy you dumb ass just do this [code]public static final int START_LOCATION_H = -1;[/code]
you can't just copy and paste the original one and change the axis to a "H" ...

item.title: Player starting position > PI > 317
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

put this public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2343 -1; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3806 -1;

Read full topic

item.title: Player starting position > PI > 317
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Tech Python, post:1, topic:412053”]hello, and yes before you leave your comments, i know exactly how to change the player starting position… it’s currently in config.java and looks like this:
public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 1234; public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 1234;

what i want to do is to make it start on the roof of a building, for this the player height would have to be “-1” …
so what i basically want to know how to do is to make it so that you can edit the height aswell, and don’t leave uneducated comments like [quote] its so easy you dumb ass just do this public static final int START_LOCATION_H = -1;[/quote]

you can’t just copy and paste the original one and change the axis to a “H” …[/quote]

Set the “heightLevel” field to -1 or whatever when you login.

Read full topic

hello, and yes before you leave your comments, i know exactly how to change the player starting position… it’s currently in config.java and looks like this:
public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 1234; public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 1234;

what i want to do is to make it start on the roof of a building, for this the player height would have to be “-1” …
so what i basically want to know how to do is to make it so that you can edit the height aswell, and don’t leave uneducated comments like

its so easy you dumb ass just do this public static final int START_LOCATION_H = -1;

you can’t just copy and paste the original one and change the axis to a “H” …
